tabs.heading: Who is Wayout
tabs.text: Wayout International, a start-up originally from Sweden, provides water production systems (POD) that can convert any source of water into safe and healthy drinking water. This sustainable solution enhances water accessibility while eliminating chemical treatments and minimizing plastic waste.

tabs.heading: Siemens Partnership
tabs.text: Embedded in Wayout's philosophy is the drive to contribute to a more sustainable world. Powered by the Digital Twin, real-time monitoring and control data enable Wayout to ensure continuous improvements. They show how any company – no matter the size – can benefit from digitalization and become a sustainable Digital Enterprise.

tabs.heading: Technologies to Scale
tabs.text:
• Insights Hub Production Copilot
  • Industrial Edge
  • WinCC Unified
  • TIA Portal
  • HMI
  • S7 controllers
  • SiGreen

tabs.heading: Water Technology
tabs.text:
• 22,000 liters of mineral water can be produced per day
  • 16mn single use plastic bottles per year
  • 100% self-sufficient and circular
